channel.title: The Lost Mountain And Other Sagas
channel.description: There's something rotten in the state of Falun, Sweden. Crops are dying, dark creatures attack at night and eery, unsettling whimpers seem to spawn from the town's church. Three friends, all who are blessed with The Sight, an ability to see and sense the Vaesen - mysterious and ancient creatures of the North - decide to investigate the matter, but little do they know that there are far darker secrets waiting to be uncovered.

image.title: The Lost Mountain And Other Sagas

channel.author: Ellinor DiLorenzo
channel.itunes:author: Ellinor DiLorenzo
channel.itunes:summary: There's something rotten in the state of Falun, Sweden. Crops are dying, dark creatures attack at night and eery, unsettling whimpers seem to spawn from the town's church. Three friends, all who are blessed with The Sight, an ability to see and sense the Vaesen - mysterious and ancient creatures of the North - decide to investigate the matter, but little do they know that there are far darker secrets waiting to be uncovered.

item.title: Season Finale - My hand in fire for you
item.description:
This is it. The end of the arc Blood Tide by Anne Richmond but also the end of the entire season of The Other Sagas. 

Thank you to all of our listeners, Free League, Andreas Lundstrom, Johan Egerkrans, Anton Vitus and everyone else who made this podcast possible.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
This is it. The end of the arc Blood Tide by Anne Richmond but also the end of the entire season of The Other Sagas. 

Thank you to all of our listeners, Free League, Andreas Lundstrom, Johan Egerkrans, Anton Vitus and everyone else who made this podcast possible.

item.title: S2E17: A selkie smooth encounter
item.description:
Please consider VOTING FOR US AT THEGAMEHERS.COM: Best TTRPG Campaign of the year. https://thegamehers.com

Trigger warning: Sex, thirsty, hot, steamy. That is also the description for this episode. 

This is part 5 of the adventure "Blood Tide", written and performed by Anne Richmond. Music by Andreas Lundstrom.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo

item.title: S2E16: We Were Thieves
item.description:
VOTE FOR US AT THEGAMEHERS.COM: Best TTRPG Campaign of the year.

https://thegamehers.com/ Voting begins September 9th 2022

Vanessa and Irina returns to a familiar place, the Church, but in there they find a haunting clue that changes the entire course of the investigation. 

This is part 4 of the adventure "Blood Tide", written and performed by Anne Richmond. Music by Andreas Lundstrom.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: S2E15: A Gullible Disaster
item.description:
Something is off about the town of Cornwall, and it's not just the smell. Our investigators are getting deeper and deeper into the mystery that's plaguing the seafarers. 

Blood tide, part 3 by Anne Richmond
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
Something is off about the town of Cornwall, and it's not just the smell. Our investigators are getting deeper and deeper into the mystery that's plaguing the seafarers. 

Blood tide, part 3 by Anne Richmond

item.title: S2E14: The Beach Episode
item.description:
Vanessa and her new and old friend travels to the southern part of England, on a mission for the Rose house. 

Blood tide, part 2, by Anne Richmond
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
Vanessa and her new and old friend travels to the southern part of England, on a mission for the Rose house. 

Blood tide, part 2, by Anne Richmond

item.title: S2E13: I am Anne, hear me roar
item.description:
And now for something *very* different. Blood Tide, part 1 by Anne Richmond.

This episode feature the new Official Soundtrack for Mythical Britain and Ireland expansion, composed by Andreas Lundström!
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
And now for something *very* different. Blood Tide, part 1 by Anne Richmond.

This episode feature the new Official Soundtrack for Mythical Britain and Ireland expansion, composed by Andreas Lundström!

item.title: S2E12: Peace, at last
item.description:
The secret of the Tammusalu Inn is slowly being revealed in the fourth installment of A Winter's Tale, by Kiku Pukk Härenstam. 

We will be back on August 18 for a completely new, and very different, adventure!
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
The secret of the Tammusalu Inn is slowly being revealed in the fourth installment of A Winter's Tale, by Kiku Pukk Härenstam. 

We will be back on August 18 for a completely new, and very different, adventure!

item.title: S2E11: At Least One Death in the Cat's Eyes
item.description: Why is that cat looking at us like that?
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Why is that cat looking at us like that?

item.title: S2E10: The Realm of Morozko
item.description:
In the wilderness of Ingria, our friends make their way to a midwinter blot hosted by the eccentric Count Constantin Constantinovich. But the winter is harsh and ruthless in this part of the world and many old and ancient secret lures in the shadows. 

This adventure is based on "A Winter's Tale" by Kiku Pukk Härenstam and is published in the new Vaesen expansion, Seasons of Mystery.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
In the wilderness of Ingria, our friends make their way to a midwinter blot hosted by the eccentric Count Constantin Constantinovich. But the winter is harsh and ruthless in this part of the world and many old and ancient secret lures in the shadows. 

This adventure is based on "A Winter's Tale" by Kiku Pukk Härenstam and is published in the new Vaesen expansion, Seasons of Mystery.

item.title: S2E9: The Land of Ingria
item.description:
REUPLOAD due to the many many tech issues we've had with this episode. THIS EPISODE IS CURSED. LISTEN AT YOUR OWN RISK. 

♫ It's time to level up, level down, make sure the party never dies. ♫ 

This adventure was written by Kiku Pukk Härenstam, featured in the upcoming adventure book Seasons of Mystery by Free League Publishing.  

This show is not suitable for children, unless you would like to explain to them what a facial is.  

We had some issues with Sydney's microphone in this episode. We tried to fix it in post but we can assure you, this is the only episode where we had this problem!
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo

item.title: S2E8: In the eye of the beholder
item.description: The thrilling finale to the Delta Green+Vaesen Mash up, but we are just getting started with these characters...
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: The thrilling finale to the Delta Green+Vaesen Mash up, but we are just getting started with these characters...

item.title: S2E7: Something about Mary
item.description:
CONTENT WARNING: Violence against minors. 

In a dark cave somewhere on the Faroe Islands, the investigators from the Rose House discover the remnants of a dark and disturbing ritual.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
CONTENT WARNING: Violence against minors. 

In a dark cave somewhere on the Faroe Islands, the investigators from the Rose House discover the remnants of a dark and disturbing ritual.

item.title: S2E6: Cemetary Gates
item.description:
The team from Rose House discovers new, alarming information as they continue to investigate what happened to their colleague.
But who is Vlada? And where is O'Rourke?

Follow us: 

https://twitter.com/lostmountainpod
https://instagram.com/thelostmountainsaga
https://www.facebook.com/TheLostMountainSaga/

Support us: https://ko-fi.com/lostmountainpod

item.title: S2E5: Beauty
item.description:
This is the first episode of a special marriage between the RPG system Vaesen and the RPG system Delta Green.

Based on the Delta Green adventure Rendezvous in Rama by Marco Menarini. 

Do not look up unless you want to get spoilers.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo

item.title: S2E4: March Fourteenth
item.description:
I... We... uh... hmm. I just... argh. 

No words.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary:
I... We... uh... hmm. I just... argh. 

No words.

item.title: S2E3: Almost Dead Poets Society
item.description: A confrontation with the woman known as The Sheep Lady, but something is wrong - terribly wrong.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: A confrontation with the woman known as The Sheep Lady, but something is wrong - terribly wrong.

item.title: S2E2: Thank You For Smoking
item.description:
Our detectives explore Hampstead to find clues about the mysterious artist commune that seem to piss off the entire neighborhood, except Brenda the NPC. 


Support the podcast: https://ko-fi.com/lostmountainpod and have a chance to win cool TTRPG stuff from Free League Publishing!

item.title: S2E1: My Father Kevin
item.description:
A man is missing, and his sister is on a mission to find him. Luckily for her, she bumps into the two most competent women in London.

item.title: S01, E20: The End
item.description: Was it just a dream?
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Was it just a dream?

item.title: S01, E19: The Lost Mountain, Part 2
item.description: Our adventurers finally make it to the Kiruna mine… the strange mine that started it all.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Our adventurers finally make it to the Kiruna mine… the strange mine that started it all.

item.title: S01, E18: The Lost Mountain, Part 1
item.description: A new friend. An invitation from the North. A mysterious village on the way. This is the beginning of the end of our saga.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: A new friend. An invitation from the North. A mysterious village on the way. This is the beginning of the end of our saga.

item.title: S01, E17: Breakneck Mountain
item.description: The intense and violent conclusion to the Western Side Story.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: The intense and violent conclusion to the Western Side Story.

item.title: S01, E16: The Pine Fisher
item.description: The gang is able to gather important information about the mysterious creature who lurks in the woods. Shout out to Jacob Bryan who provided us with the supercool Vaesen for this story!
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: The gang is able to gather important information about the mysterious creature who lurks in the woods. Shout out to Jacob Bryan who provided us with the supercool Vaesen for this story!

item.title: S01, E15: The Mayflower: Origins
item.description: A popular mining town during the Gold Rush, in a remote part of the world is being plagued by people disappearing and bodies being found in what seems to be ritualistic killings.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: A popular mining town during the Gold Rush, in a remote part of the world is being plagued by people disappearing and bodies being found in what seems to be ritualistic killings.

item.title: S01, E14: Min älskade Astrid
item.description: Old ghosts from the past pays a visit, as Astrid and Henrik tries to understand the mystery about the Lindworm.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Old ghosts from the past pays a visit, as Astrid and Henrik tries to understand the mystery about the Lindworm.

item.title: S01, E13: The Viking, The Witch and the The Celiac Disease
item.description: Our adventurers find themselves in the middle of their deadliest challenge yet as the past comes back to haunt them.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Our adventurers find themselves in the middle of their deadliest challenge yet as the past comes back to haunt them.

item.title: S01, E12: A Good Man
item.description: Spring has definitely sprung and our heroes find time to enjoy themselves. But for how long before something goes wrong? Not long.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Spring has definitely sprung and our heroes find time to enjoy themselves. But for how long before something goes wrong? Not long.

item.title: S01, E11: Valborg
item.description: Spring is in the air. Tension relief is on the menu.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Spring is in the air. Tension relief is on the menu.

item.title: S01, E10: I am Francisco Castejón
item.description: Things are about to get violent in the small town of Sävsjö, Småland.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Things are about to get violent in the small town of Sävsjö, Småland.

item.title: S01, E09: Toad trouble
item.description: The team digs deeper into the mystery of the missing young women, but internal politics is starting to bleed into the investigation. Special Guest: Skid Maher!
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: The team digs deeper into the mystery of the missing young women, but internal politics is starting to bleed into the investigation. Special Guest: Skid Maher!

item.title: S01, E08: Sävsjö, Småland.
item.description: A new friend joins the group, as they travel down south to explore the strange murders of two young women.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: A new friend joins the group, as they travel down south to explore the strange murders of two young women.

item.title: S01, E07: You'll never get an Elli.
item.description: In the aftermath of a brutal fight, Henrik and Astrid makes their way back to Uppsala for rest and recovery. But this story is not about rest and recovery.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: In the aftermath of a brutal fight, Henrik and Astrid makes their way back to Uppsala for rest and recovery. But this story is not about rest and recovery.

item.title: S01, E06: She found us.
item.description: Is there a way to peacefully negotiate with a wrathful demigoddess, whose heart is made of ice? Henrik and Astrid are about to find out.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Is there a way to peacefully negotiate with a wrathful demigoddess, whose heart is made of ice? Henrik and Astrid are about to find out.

item.title: S01, E05: May she never find us.
item.description: Our adventurers find themselves in a remote village in northern Norway, where perpetual darkness and an unforgiving winter has caught them in its cold grasp.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Our adventurers find themselves in a remote village in northern Norway, where perpetual darkness and an unforgiving winter has caught them in its cold grasp.

item.title: S01, E04: One Flew Over Jörgen's Nest
item.description: Trying to desperately piece together the various fragments left by their old friend, our friends decide to pay the Asylum a visit - a forsaken, cruel place that will make anyone question their own sanity.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: Trying to desperately piece together the various fragments left by their old friend, our friends decide to pay the Asylum a visit - a forsaken, cruel place that will make anyone question their own sanity.

item.title: S01, E03: Horn Identity
item.description: After witnessing a truly miraculous event, Henrik and Astrid are worried that things aren't exactly as they seem and decide to dig deeper - in every possible way.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: After witnessing a truly miraculous event, Henrik and Astrid are worried that things aren't exactly as they seem and decide to dig deeper - in every possible way.

item.title: S01, E02: Not impossible. Science.
item.description: After a terrifying revelation regarding his dear friend, Henrik finds comfort in the home of Astrid. Meanwhile, everyone is getting ready for another holiday season with Swedish Christmas traditions including glamorous parties, fantastic foods and unspeakable horrors.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: After a terrifying revelation regarding his dear friend, Henrik finds comfort in the home of Astrid. Meanwhile, everyone is getting ready for another holiday season with Swedish Christmas traditions including glamorous parties, fantastic foods and unspeakable horrors.

item.title: S01, E01: Going to The Sweden
item.description: In the Season 1 premiere of The Lost Mountain Saga, we revisit Henrik and Astrid, now residing in Uppsala. Three years have passed since the tragedy in Falun, but there are still so many questions left unanswered. Questions that might require some broad, sweeping assumptions.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: In the Season 1 premiere of The Lost Mountain Saga, we revisit Henrik and Astrid, now residing in Uppsala. Three years have passed since the tragedy in Falun, but there are still so many questions left unanswered. Questions that might require some broad, sweeping assumptions.

item.title: I Love You, Mother (Prologue, part 3)
item.description: After a frightening encounter with the Vaesen, Henrik, Astrid and Franzibald is now getting closer and closer the truth. But at what cost?
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: After a frightening encounter with the Vaesen, Henrik, Astrid and Franzibald is now getting closer and closer the truth. But at what cost?

item.title: Figgy of your imagination (Prologue, part 2)
item.description: As the gang continue their investigation to find out more about the strange and unsettling events that plagues the town, Henrik meets an old acquaintance.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: As the gang continue their investigation to find out more about the strange and unsettling events that plagues the town, Henrik meets an old acquaintance.

item.title: Bird, Interrupted (Prologue, part 1)
item.description: It's in the middle of the 19th century. Industrialization sparks conflicts between the old and the new world. Meanwhile, three friends set out to investigate some strange events happening in the old mining town of Falun, Sweden.
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: It's in the middle of the 19th century. Industrialization sparks conflicts between the old and the new world. Meanwhile, three friends set out to investigate some strange events happening in the old mining town of Falun, Sweden.

item.title: The Lost Mountain Saga: Introduction
item.description: In about a week, we will be releasing our brand new Actual Play series called The Lost Mountain Saga! Make sure you hit subscribe on your favorite Podcast app and don't miss our big release!
item.dc:creator: Ellinor DiLorenzo
item.itunes:summary: In about a week, we will be releasing our brand new Actual Play series called The Lost Mountain Saga! Make sure you hit subscribe on your favorite Podcast app and don't miss our big release!
